title: When is the Rune Refund going to happen?
body:
My IP and Blue Essence have merged, but I didn't get any refund whatsoever for my rune purchases. I assumed the refund would be in time for the start of the blue essence sale - but now I'm scared to spend any.

EDIT: Nevermind, just saw the missions. Although Loot is current disabled, so I can't open the Blue Essence container.

replies.body: Nice! Got it figured out all on your own. For anyone else that sees this, you do need to play a game which will complete the new missions for you. Those missions start the rune refund!
